english.segment1: So many things I wish to say to you. Hard as I try-words cannot explain. So I, lift my eyes and lift my hands. In awe of you, adoring you. And I want to say that I love you..
english.segment2: Oh how I love to love You. Oh how I love to love You. I love to love You
english.segment3: So many things I wish to thank you for. Hard as I try, words cannot express my gratitude. So I, lift my heart and lift my soul. In awe of You, I worship you. And I want to say that I love you. And I want to say that I need you..
english.segment4: Oh how I love to love You. Oh how I love to love You. Cause I love. I love you Lord. I reach, I wait, I run, I praise. I love you
english.segment5: I am like the willow. Living by the streams. I drink of your river. I praise you for your love. I praise you for this peace. My Lord, my Love, my Life-giver
english.segment6: Oh how I love to love You. Oh how I love to love You
english.segment7: I wait (I love to love You). I wait for you (I love to love You). I reach, I reach for You (I love to love You). Cause I love. I love You Lord. I reach, I wait, I run, I praise. I love You. I love to love You (4X).
